description: The On Street Bike Facilities layer contains data for existing and proposed on-street bicycle facilities in Baltimore, such as bike lanes, sharrows, and signed routes. The On Street Bike Facilities layer can be tied directly to and is derived from the Baltimore City street centerline data layer. It should be noted that this data layer is a snap shot in time and will be updated regularly. The data is provided "as is" and the City of Baltimore will not be liable for its use or misuse by any party.

name: On Street Bike Facilities
